---
title: "SEO"
description: "Optimize SEO with meta tag configuration for better search visibility"
---

Your documentation automatically handles many SEO best practices, including:

- **Meta tag generation** - Title, description, Open Graph, Twitter cards
- **Sitemap generation** - Auto-generated `/sitemap.xml`
- **Robots.txt** - Auto-generated `/robots.txt`
- **Semantic HTML** - Proper heading hierarchy
- **Mobile optimization** - Responsive design

## Auto-Generated Files

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="sitemap.xml" icon="map" href="/sitemap.xml">
    XML sitemap for search engines
  </Card>
  <Card title="robots.txt" icon="robot" href="/robots.txt">
    Crawler instructions
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## Global Meta Tags

Set default meta tags for all pages in your `docs.json`:

```json
{
  "name": "My Documentation",
  "seo": {
    "metatags": {
      "og:image": "https://example.com/og-image.png",
      "twitter:site": "@yourhandle",
      "google-site-verification": "your-verification-code"
    }
  }
}
```

## Canonical URL

Set a canonical URL for your custom domain:

```json
{
  "seo": {
    "metatags": {
      "canonical": "https://docs.yourdomain.com"
    }
  }
}
```

<Tip>
A canonical URL tells search engines which version of your documentation is primary, preventing duplicate content issues.
</Tip>

## Page-Level Meta Tags

Add meta tags to individual pages via frontmatter:

```yaml
---
title: "Getting Started"
description: "Learn how to set up your project"
"og:image": "https://example.com/getting-started.png"
"og:title": "Getting Started Guide"
keywords: ["setup", "installation", "quickstart"]
---
```

### Supported Page Meta Tags

| Tag | Description |
|-----|-------------|
| `title` | Page title |
| `description` | Page description for search results |
| `keywords` | Array of keywords |
| `og:title` | Open Graph title |
| `og:description` | Open Graph description |
| `og:image` | Open Graph image URL |
| `og:url` | Open Graph URL |
| `og:type` | Open Graph type (website, article) |
| `twitter:title` | Twitter card title |
| `twitter:description` | Twitter card description |
| `twitter:image` | Twitter card image |
| `twitter:card` | Card type (summary, summary_large_image) |
| `twitter:site` | Twitter site handle |
| `noindex` | Set to `true` to prevent indexing |
| `robots` | Custom robots directive |

<Note>
Meta tags with colons (like `og:image`) must be wrapped in quotes in frontmatter.
</Note>

## Disable Indexing

### Single Page

Prevent a page from being indexed:

```yaml
---
title: "Draft Page"
noindex: true
---
```

### All Pages

Disable indexing for all pages in `docs.json`:

```json
{
  "seo": {
    "metatags": {
      "robots": "noindex"
    }
  }
}
```

## Custom Sitemap & Robots

Override auto-generated files by creating your own:

<FileTree>
  <Folder name="your-docs" defaultOpen>
    <File name="sitemap.xml" comment="Custom sitemap" />
    <File name="robots.txt" comment="Custom robots" />
    <File name="docs.json" />
  </Folder>
</FileTree>

## Common Meta Tags Reference

```json
{
  "seo": {
    "metatags": {
      "charset": "UTF-8",
      "viewport": "width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0",
      "description": "Your site description",
      "keywords": "keyword1, keyword2, keyword3",
      "author": "Your Name",
      "robots": "index, follow",
      "googlebot": "index, follow",
      "google-site-verification": "verification_token",
      "theme-color": "#000000",
      "canonical": "https://your-domain.com",
      
      "og:title": "Open Graph Title",
      "og:type": "website",
      "og:url": "https://example.com",
      "og:image": "https://example.com/og.jpg",
      "og:description": "Open Graph Description",
      "og:site_name": "Site Name",
      "og:locale": "en_US",
      
      "twitter:card": "summary_large_image",
      "twitter:site": "@username",
      "twitter:creator": "@username",
      "twitter:title": "Twitter Title",
      "twitter:description": "Twitter Description",
      "twitter:image": "https://example.com/twitter.jpg",
      
      "apple-mobile-web-app-capable": "yes",
      "apple-mobile-web-app-title": "App Title",
      "application-name": "App Name",
      "msapplication-TileColor": "#000000"
    }
  }
}
```

## SEO Best Practices

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title="Write descriptive titles and descriptions">
    - Keep titles under 60 characters
    - Keep descriptions under 160 characters
    - Include relevant keywords naturally
    - Make each page title unique
  </Accordion>
  
  <Accordion title="Optimize content structure">
    - Use proper heading hierarchy (H1 → H2 → H3)
    - Include relevant keywords in headings
    - Break content into scannable sections
    - Use lists and tables for structured data
  </Accordion>
  
  <Accordion title="Internal linking strategy">
    - Link between related pages
    - Use descriptive anchor text
    - Create a logical navigation structure
    - Avoid orphan pages
  </Accordion>
  
  <Accordion title="Image SEO">
    - Use descriptive alt text
    - Optimize image file sizes
    - Use descriptive file names
    - Consider lazy loading for performance
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>

## Preview Your Meta Tags

Use [metatags.io](https://metatags.io/) to preview how your pages will appear on:

- Google search results
- Facebook shares
- Twitter cards
- LinkedIn posts
